duties_responsibilities.duty: Formulate quality plans for new products within the product delivery, order fulfillment, or customer support processes.
Perform activities to minimize risk and prevent quality issues.
Recommend changes to control plans and/or prints based on investigations of product and process quality related issues.
Gather and analyze data pertinent to quality tools in the Enterprise Order Fulfillment Process (EOFP), Enterprise Product Delivery Process (EPDP), and/or Customer Support Process (CSP).
Perform quality audits and maintain quality manual.
Input and maintain information in factory databases and systems.
Assist in reviews and investigations of warranty claim information.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or related field (Master's preferred)
